fields.title: What we collect
fields.content: We may collect information you provide directly (name, email, profile details, messages), payment and billing details, and usage data (pages visited, actions, device and browser info).

fields.title: How we use your data
fields.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process payments, send transactional emails, and for security and fraud prevention. Marketing emails are only sent if you opt in.

fields.title: Cookies and tracking
fields.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember preferences, analyze usage, and personalize content. Third-party services (analytics, payment providers) may also set cookies.

fields.title: Sharing & Third parties
fields.content: We do not sell personal data. We may share info with service providers (payments, analytics, email) or if required by law. Only necessary data is shared.

fields.title: Your rights
fields.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. You can opt out of marketing anytime. Contact us below to exercise your rights.

fields.title: Data retention
fields.content: We keep data as long as necessary for services, legal obligations, and dispute resolution. Data is anonymized/aggregated after retention ends.

fields.title: Security
fields.content: We apply industry-standard security measures to protect data. No method is 100% secureâ€”please contact us immediately if you suspect a breach.

fields.title: Contact
fields.content: If you have questions, email us at support@example.com.
